Ranked 14th in the UK and 87th globally
Times Higher Education World University Rankings 2025
A diverse community with students from over 130 countries
Clearing 2025Clearing at Southampton is now open. If you have your results, you can apply now. We are here to give you the support and advice you need to consider your options.

Open DaysOur undergraduate and postgraduate events are a great way to find out what it’s like to study here. You can find out more about the University, courses, accommodation, student support and societies.
Find a subjectExplore the subjects you can study at the University of Southampton using our subject finder. Find out about the expert staff and facilities available to you as a student.
Explore our campusesGet a feel for our spaces. We have 6 campuses in Southampton, 1 in Winchester and 1 in Malaysia.
Find accommodationDiscover university student accommodation with a range of options to suit your budget and lifestyle.
Your student communityMeet new people, develop new interests, and give back to the community through volunteering opportunities.
